snippet: Turnips are often overlooked by food shoppers, but they can be a surprisingly flavorful addition to your table.
abstract: Turnips are often overlooked by food shoppers, but they can be a surprisingly flavorful addition to your table.
lead_paragraph: Last fall, I was speaking with the Meatball Shop chef, Daniel Holzman, and the conversation turned to one of his favorite side dishes: Smashed Turnips With Fresh Horseradish.
